title: info about the corporate scholarships at pes available in the final year as mentioned on their website?

comments.body:
I have never heard of any corporate scholarships being mentioned at all, even though it is on their website. I graduated in 2022, and I do not remember anything being said about it this year, the previous year and tbh pretty much since I joined in 2018. 

Its possible it does not exist anymore and the site hasn't been updated. A lot of PESU websites such as the clubs website, are actually outdated and should not be depended upon for accurate information.
